name: Dark Red Space Tumblr
description:
Follow me here>>> ( http://deveerei.tumblr.com )

NO UPDATE-Oct/29/12 12:12am* Due to tumblr's updating and me not owning the background image, some specs may not be supported anymore. You can still install this and edit it through stylish, just change the codes a bit, i.e the body's background (changing only that would fix it)
UPDATED-Jun/14/10/4:30pm* Change blue border-bottom in dashboard notifications to black...
UPDATED-Jun/14/10/3:52pm* Fixed padding for post editing...
UPDATED-Jun/14/10/3:26pm* Endless page loading made transparent (originally blue)...
UPDATED-Jun/14/10/1:00pm* All page content paddings have been fixed...

Space background...
50% Opacity content background...
Dark red and black color...
blockquote-fix...

To those who edited my codes and uploaded them here in userstyles with proper credits or with a link back to this page, thank you.

user.name: deveerei
user.about: Disclaimers: All or some images of my userstyles belong to other people and please tell me if I didn't credited them properly due to my irresponsibility. Contact me @ http://deveerei.tumblr.com/ask (I'm inactive and I can't reply asap)

discussions.name: Text not visible in text input fields, list of errors, bad selection marker, same old recycled code
